channel.title: Less is better: Floyd Landis is one tough dude

item.title: Floyd Landis is one tough dude
item.description:
He’s been racing several years with osteonecrosis. a condition where the head of his femor is literally cut off from its blood supply. In other words, the joint is dying; it’s similar to the condition that forced Bo Jackson to retire from sports.

Floyd is getting a new hip several weeks after this year’s Tour de France – one which he’s doing extremely well at right now – he’s in second place, 1 minute back in the GC. This is one tough guy.

Read this excellent article in the New York Times to see just how tough Floyd is.

I’m rooting for Floyd this year.

BTW, I also read this interview in Bicycling magazine where Floyd’s good friend Dave Zabriskie (who rides for CSC) interviews him. This is one of the funniest interviews I have ever read. It’s little wonder that Lance Armstrong used to call these two “Dumb and Dumber” when they rode for US Postal!
item.author: jlam@iunknown.com (John Lam)
